items.description:
Alert target for critical FINML alerts.  Alerts sent to this target will go through BigPanda to both Slack and PagerDuty via pattern matching on tags from the alert: tagging an alert with "ml.fin.svc.<service-name>" will tell BigPanda where to route the alerts in PagerDuty.
Currently supported tags:
- ml.fin.svc.spend-management -> PagerDuty: ML FIN Spend Management-On Call, https://workday.pagerduty.com/service-directory/PZ7MFDL
- ml.fin.svc.expense-protect -> PagerDuty: ML FIN Expense Protect-On Call, https://workday.pagerduty.com/service-directory/PS4FVRC
- ml.fin.svc.payment-matching -> PagerDuty: ML FIN Payment Matching-On Call, https://workday.pagerduty.com/service-directory/PY7H8BS

- anything with ml.fin.training in it -> PagerDuty: ML FIN Zero Automated Training-On Call, https://workday.pagerduty.com/service-directory/PH97ILX
items.title: ML-FIN-CRITICAL-BigPanda

items.template:
{
  "app_key": "b1900a04231b16a598b467e3cc58c72d",
  "alerts": [
      {{#trimTrailingComma}}
        {{#newlyFailingAlertSeries}}
            {
              "incident_identifier" : "{{host}}-{{#jsonEscape}}{{{name}}}{{/jsonEscape}}-{{#jsonEscape}}{{#tags}}{{tenant}}{{/tags}}{{/jsonEscape}}",
              "host" : "{{#host}}{{{host}}}{{/host}}{{^host}}{{#jsonEscape}}{{#tags}}{{#tenant}}{{{tenant}}}{{/tenant}}{{^tenant}}aggregate{{/tenant}}{{/tags}}{{^tags}}aggregate{{/tags}}{{/jsonEscape}}{{/host}}",
              "status": {{#severitySevere}}"critical"{{/severitySevere}}{{#severityWarn}}"warning"{{/severityWarn}}{{#severityInfo}}"unknown"{{/severityInfo}}{{#severitySmoke}}"unknown"{{/severitySmoke}},
              "check": "{{#jsonEscape}}{{{name}}}{{/jsonEscape}}",
              "description": "{{#jsonEscape}}{{{subject}}} {{{reason}}} [{{{severity}}}] {{{name}}}{{/jsonEscape}}\nMessage: \n{{#jsonEscape}}{{{errorMessage}}}{{/jsonEscape}}",
              "additionalInformation": "{{#jsonEscape}}{{{additionalInformation}}}{{/jsonEscape}}",
              "url": "{{{url}}}",
              "alert_severity": "{{{severity}}}",
              "condition": "{{#jsonEscape}}{{{condition}}}{{/jsonEscape}}",
              "host_tags": "{{#jsonEscape}}{{{tags}}}{{/jsonEscape}}",
              "alert_tags" : "{{#alertTags}}{{#jsonEscape}}{{{.}}}{{/jsonEscape}}|{{/alertTags}}",
